Flow.label: Call Closure

fields.name: Warning_0_0
fields.fieldText: This call has been Cleared but still editable.

fields.name: Warning_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: This call has been Cleared. No additional updates can be made in Field Service.

fields.name: General_Error
fields.fieldText: Hmm. That didn't work. Please refresh the page and try again. If you continue to receive this message, please contact AAA Dispatch.

fields.name: ErrorTextCancel
fields.fieldText: The status of service appointment should be Declined/Spotted/Scheduled, Dispatched or En Route to Cancel, this service appointment is currently in {!Get_Service_Appointment_Status.Status} status.

fields.name: RL_error_message
fields.fieldText: Sorry, we weren't able to save your changes because another user or process made an update at the same time. Please refresh the page and try again. If the issue persists, notify AAA Dispatch.
